description:
Luxury one bedroom in Astoria, NYC. My place is ideal for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers.
The subway to the City is a 12 min walk from the building but you can always take the bus which is right in front of the building to connect with the subway. From there, Midtown Manhattan is just 5 stops away straight!

1BD with Private Balcony, Washer/Dryer, Queen size bed in a Pet Friendly, Luxury Building.
The building’s amenity package includes a doorman (24 hour attended lobby), complimentary fitness center and roof terrace with amazing views to Manhattan.

AMENITIES
- High speed Internet - WIFI
- AC
- Kitchen fully equipped. 
- Washer and Dryer.
- Bathroom with clean new towels, hair dryer, soap and shampoo provided
- Gym in the building

I will be in touch before and during their stay.

Astoria is home to a rich vibrant community on Queens western edge.
Here you will find great diversity along with beautiful parks, a strong art presence, and an amazing food scene (coffee shops, cafes, bakeries and restaurants).
There is a supermarket one block away opened 24/7.

The subway to the City is a 12 min walk from the building but you can always take the bus which is right in front of the building to connect with the subway. From there, Midtown Manhattan is just 5 stops away straight!
Uber is $15 to $25 to Manhattan.
name: Luxury one bedroom in NYC
review: The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
